title: Disaster ’76
description: Pilot Sherman Vance boards a plane for the day of his life.
quote: Well, we make the 11:00 o’clock news again tonight.
altHero: a plane flying in the air with a giant hole in the side of it
alt1: a pilot talks with a flight attendant in a trashed cockpit
alt2: a man with glasses reflects as flames rise up around him
alt3: the pilot on an emergency raft in the ocean next to a shark fin
